briefTitle: Family History and Breast Cancer Education Trial
officialTitle: You Cannot Change Your Family History, But You Can Change What You do With it: A Peer-based Education Program to Reduce Breast Cancer Risk in African American Women
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in Knowledge of Genetic Screening for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 40 years of age and older
* Live in predominately African American communities (ZIP codes)

Exclusion Criteria:

* No previous breast cancer diagnosis
